an3.110:1.1: Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an3.110:1.2: “citte, gahapati, byapanne kayakammampi byapannam hoti, vacikammampi byapannam hoti, manokammampi byapannam hoti.
an3.110:1.3: Tassa byapannakayakammantassa byapannavacikammantassa byapannamanokammantassa na bhaddakam maranam hoti, na bhaddika kalakiriya.
an3.110:1.4: Seyyathapi, gahapati, kutagare ducchanne kutampi byapannam hoti, gopanasiyopi byapanna honti, bhittipi byapanna hoti;
an3.110:1.5: evamevam kho, gahapati, citte byapanne kayakammampi byapannam hoti, vacikammampi byapannam hoti, manokammampi byapannam hoti.
an3.110:1.6: Tassa byapannakayakammantassa byapannavacikammantassa byapannamanokammantassa na bhaddakam maranam hoti, na bhaddika kalakiriya.
an3.110:2.1: Citte, gahapati, abyapanne kayakammampi abyapannam hoti, vacikammampi abyapannam hoti, manokammampi abyapannam hoti.
an3.110:2.2: Tassa abyapannakayakammantassa abyapannavacikammantassa abyapannamanokammantassa bhaddakam maranam hoti, bhaddika kalakiriya.
an3.110:2.3: Seyyathapi, gahapati, kutagare succhanne kutampi abyapannam hoti, gopanasiyopi abyapanna honti, bhittipi abyapanna hoti;
an3.110:2.4: evamevam kho, gahapati, citte abyapanne kayakammampi abyapannam hoti, vacikammampi abyapannam hoti, manokammampi abyapannam hoti.
an3.110:2.5: Tassa abyapannakayakammantassa …pe… abyapannamanokammantassa bhaddakam maranam hoti, bhaddika kalakiriya”ti.
